4. Michele Blythe

Michele Blythe
==============

![Michele Blythe ](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=3378 "Michele Blythe ")

Michele Blythe, Position 4
--------------------------

[Email](mailto:micheleb@arlingtonwa.gov)

Term Information
----------------

* Elected Term January 2024 through December 31, 2027

Occupation
----------

Michele has 30 successful years in the banking and financial industry. "I have experience mentoring staff, managing multiple bank offices, managing millions of dollars for families and businesses, and experience with audits and risk management."

Family
------

Michele and her husband moved here in 2004 on military orders. "We were so fortunate to have found this community. We have four grown children and three grandchildren. We always have at least one fur-kid in our home."

Hobbies
-------

Interior decorating, reading and walking.

Current Affiliations/Associations
---------------------------------

o    Law Enforcement Officers and Firefighters Disability Board (LEOFF 1)  
o    Governor's Appointment - State Council on Aging, Chair  
o    Appointment - Snohomish County Council on Aging, Vice Chair  
o    Board Member, The NOAH Center, Northwest Organization for Animal Help  
o    Appointment - Legislative Priorities Committee - Association of Washington Cities 2nd Term  
o    Appointment - Federal Legislative Priorities Committee – Association of Washington Cities  
o    Supporter ASPCA – American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals  
o    City Council Liaison for Airport Commission  
o    Certificate of Municipal Leadership - Association of Washington Cities  
o    Advanced Certificate of Municipal Leadership - Association of Washington Cities  
o    Former Co-chair and Commissioner for the Arlington Civil Service Commission    
o    Former member of Executive Board of Directors, Stilly Valley Chamber of Commerce
